extendedInfo.description: â â â 2013 OFFICIAL UK DRIVING THEORY TEST preparation materials â â âFREE VERSION of Driving Theory Test (UK) uses the Latest (2013) Official theory test revision question data bank in an intuitive, powerful way and is one of the most flexible applications on the market. REVISE MULTIPLE TOPICS at the same time! CHOOSE how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions! In this free version 7 full topics are included.IMPORTANT NOTICE: contains the Latest (2013) Official UK Driving Theory Test revision question data bank complying with a new DSA regulations as of 23rd January 2012.The main features are:********** â Regularly updated. 2013 ready! ******************** â Works offline. Get as much training as you need when you need it. ******************** â Realistic. Try your skills in the Mock Test as many times as you wish! ******************** â Advertisement free! ******************** â Flexible ********** - Theory Test intelligently takes into account which questions have been previously answered incorrectly! - Allows revision of multiple topics at the same time- NO ANNOYING REPETITION: choose how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions - Choose the number of questions you want to answer during a practice test - Full statistics with the number of questions still to be answered on the front screen********** â The Official UK Driving Theory Test revision question database ********** In this free version 7 full topics are included.********** â Easy to use ********** - Intuitive standardised interface allows you to focus on your test - Revise each question after test completion - Useful hints to make your learning more efficient

reviews.title: Not bad considering its free
reviews.comment: Good questions. Well thought out app. Features some high quality skills so that you can learn the basics of driving theory
reviews.author: Joel Young

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: I really like this app, Burr for me to change my rating to 5stars, the mock theory needs to contain 50 questions. Please sort this out
reviews.author: James Freeman

reviews.comment: Love it :) Its given me a real confidence boost for my test. Downloading the full version as I type!
reviews.author: Laura Curtis

reviews.title: Fab
reviews.comment: Just what any learner driver need to help them brilliant it also goes through the questions until u get them all correct
reviews.author: Jean Brogan

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Gr8 software for smart phone, I can use it any time any where I want, gr8 value for money. I hvnt give my theory test yet but I hv a feeling that I will pass in first time, fingers crossed & hope for the best.
reviews.author: monsur shahryar

reviews.comment: Good apps... i can recommend to friends and everyone whose planning to have their drive test.
reviews.author: joy Lozano

reviews.title: Very good app,  blind.
reviews.comment: for those whom are driver for more than 22 years...and are color And drive on left hand side & also got manual gear change.
reviews.author: Andre Amorim

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It really good if you have time share and even if you are on the go .
reviews.author: Leanne Fry

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: I love it! The layout is simple and nice, and there are no ads! I always go on this app when I\'m either bored or while I\'m in bed, and it helps to get these sort of questions stuck in your mind. 5 stars!
reviews.author: Allana Watson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s a gr8 app. It really helped me to practice my theory anytime and anywhere I wanted to
reviews.author: Mirza Jafari

reviews.title: Useful and helpful
reviews.comment: I really like the app. Shame its not all available. If yoy want it all you have to pay for it. Good for free though
reviews.author: Victoria Hobbs

reviews.title: You cant go wrong
reviews.comment: I think this is brill for a free app, the only thing missing is hazzard perception videos that you can expect in the test. But over all I love it
reviews.author: Charlotte Bowen

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: The practical aspect needs to be developed or included
reviews.author: Anthony Alale

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app, many questions of different categories that you can choose, others you have to pay for. Gives you mock & coach options, only sad thing is I may have to install to free up space
reviews.author: Grace Carter-sitch

reviews.comment: Brilliant if I pass I will give it 5 stars :-)
reviews.author: jodi lillie

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: The uk driving test was exceptional and extraordinary wow the beautiful and magnificent thing i have yet seen before my eyes
reviews.author: Muhammad Awais Paras

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Lovin this app, I have bought the propa theory, but this is great on the go. WELL DONE :-D XX
reviews.author: sharon davies

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app.  Highly recommended for all learners
reviews.author: Mladen Yanev

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: It is good with the fact im dyslexic but I find it fun and helpful
reviews.author: Lesley Duquemin

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I think this app is really good nd beneficial 4every1who wanna pass theory 1st time in one go....ill say so u should download it fast as u can 2dy....i love this app
reviews.author: afifa saiyed
